groups.name: Container Image
groups.description: Image to be used for container

groups.name: Networking and Services
groups.description: Configure Network and Services for Container

groups.name: Storage and Persistence
groups.description: Persist and Share Data that is Separate from the Container

groups.name: Resources and Devices
groups.description: Specify Resources/Devices to be Allocated to Workload

attrs.label: Stop All
attrs.description: Stops All Running pods and hibernates cnpg

attrs.label: Hibernate
attrs.description: enable to safely hibernate and shutdown the postgresql cluster

attrs.label: Mode
attrs.description: Cluster mode of operation. Available modes: standalone - default mode. Creates new or updates an existing CNPG cluster. recovery - Same as standalone but creates a cluster from a backup, object store or via pg_basebackup replica - Creates a replica cluster from an existing CNPG cluster. # TODO.

PostgresSQL

This App is supplied by TrueCharts, for more information visit the manual: https://truecharts.org/charts/dev/postgresql

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
15.0.17.detailed_readme:
title: README

General Info

TrueCharts can be installed as both normal Helm Charts or as Apps on TrueNAS SCALE. However only installations using the TrueNAS SCALE Apps system are supported.

For more information about this App, please check the docs on the TrueCharts website

This chart is not maintained by the upstream project and any issues with the chart should be raised here

Support

  • Please check our quick-start guides for TrueNAS SCALE.
  • See the Website
  • Check our Discord
  • Open a issue

Sponsor TrueCharts

TrueCharts can only exist due to the incredible effort of our staff. Please consider making a donation or contributing back to the project any way you can!
